Data Visualization R 17-Oct-2025 1 Introduction This workshop introduces data visualization in R using ggplot2, plotly. We will cover both theory and practical exercises. 1.1 Goals Understand R visualization grammar Produce publication-ready plots Explore real datasets 2025 • Data Science Platform • CFB
